content.detailedDescription: Saw weird color light glowing over monument from 10 miles away drove up took picture image appeared on camera.The spot where it happened is a monument made out of granite marking highest point in new jersey and is lit at night on four sides .I thought something big was going on like fire or plane crash ,once there did not see anything with own eyes only appeared in picture
content.summary: Skull and lion face

content.detailedDescription:
This is a follow up to a previously reported sighting, witnesses bruce hargreaves donald gaskill. 
 
  i realized that i in fact did have lost time after the sighting i was left alone with the camping gear. i remember gathering wood for the fire but not starting it. my next memory is looking at the fire from a seat on a large log
it is now pitch dark and a party is going on around me. it was daylight when i began gathering wood 7:30-8:00 pm. about 11:30pm.

  i have begun having fragmented memories within the past year and a picture has begun to emerge. i remember hearing a voice telling me that he is the pilot responsible for ferrying the guys at the top of the food chain in this case edward teller from wright patterson afb to this facility for research projects and experiments. this place is one of the first and still most secret no one has even guessed that there is something like this here.

  the next thing i remember is the  same voice saying that they have been flying the same path so the tree tops should glow at night all along the path ha ha just kidding , but the annular grow ring of the trees should show signs of high radiation all along the path like bread crumbs right to the front door and down the rabbit hole. i can tell you all this because you will never remember haha ha ha have fun .

  that is strange i realize but that is what i am remembering. everything i try to visualize is blurred vision of people the voice sounds like we are in a fairly large area inside. there are other words and phrases i can hear being said but none of it makes any sense. 

  i would have skipped sending this except that the name edward teller made me think that it could lead to discovering a dumb in the vicinity western pa or wv that was one of the first in the country built at the time that the nuclear power station was built. the words research facility are said several times.  

 thanks for the time contact me if you think it would be worth it. 
i am considering having a regressive session to see if i can get a complete memory. 


                                                       thanks

                                                     bruce
content.summary: Unloading camping gear remote. heard loud crack of breaking tree limb. looked up and out of the tree top and across the creek, back into tree tops gone

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work and saw through my windshield what i thought at first was a plane. but there was something unusual about the pulsating light. the light rays came from the center in a very strange way...It's hard to explain. at first i thought i was one object...But as it passed over my car i think it was two objects very close to each other. the smaller one had a steady blue light and the larger one had a very intense bright white light that seemed almost more like lightning than a normal light. i saw a ufo a month ago but by the time i pulled over it was gone. i never saw anything move so fast! this one i was lucky enough to get a brief clip of.It was around 9 at night just like the previous one ( or 2...I think they were also 2 very close to each other). i got a very strange feeling when observing these objects. very hard to explain. i wish the video wasn't so shaky...But i knew if i pulled over to get a steady shot this one would also be gone. it's not like the previous one. it had 2 steady white lights...Nothing was flashing at all...This one was flashing like crazy. incredible amount of energy came off that bright light.
content.summary: Coming home from work...Saw strange lights pulsating in the sky through car windshield.

content.detailedDescription: On the afternoon of march 12th at 11:26 am, i was walking back from me car and notice a few people pointing to the sky. i walked to see what it was, the object ( black in color) shaped like a boomerang but not a complete open ended triangle. like a grub worm stretched out. it was due west at 70 plus degree altitude heading south or so it seemed. i ran inside to get a phone to take pictures and make a calls to whomever that could confirm the ufo. i talked to the other persons outside watching it along with me. some side it was a blimp i replied, it's way to hi for that to be a blimp. then the comments of its a plane. i replied, no wings on it or vapor trail, plus it isn't moving!  at this point the others lost interest and went on with their day. i continued to call to confirm the ufo. about ten minuets into viewing the ufo, it changed colors from black to whitest gray in a rolling fashion. the color changed in a movement like how a alligator rolls when drowning its pray, but much slower and it happened in a sequence of one. after changing color it then seemed to move due south just enough to change location. the moment was slow, this is what helped me distinguish how large and hi the ufo was.  a commercial airliner flying south in the direction of the ufo was coming to pass. the plan is getting closer to the ufo, and is now flying under it. i can now see that the ufo is two to three time the size of the plan in flight.  no doter or deviation in flight course happened with ether of the crafts. it was as if the plan didn't see the ufo while flying under it. the trails of the airliner are no being used by my hand to measure with. the plan and ufo was about four fingers apart (arm fully extended). i would say the given the plans altitude with the white vapor tails.  the ufo was somewhere of double the plans height or lower orbit. i was still trying to contact somebody who could conform this sighting. finally at 12 pm, i am now speaking with a person of authority in washington d.C. i am then told to contact some of the same persons, i had already talk with previously.  i explained that i already went through those channels trying to do this correctly. as i am talking to this person. the ufo changed color again back to white then hovered over my location heading southeast.  it now changed back to black. while trying to keep the sun out of my eyes. the ufo ascended up into space into the sun at a steady speed to the point i can no longer see it. as all this was happening, he then gave me a contact that would know how to help me. i called the # given and did reach the person of authority, but was told that she had not been over seeing any communications of that nature for many years.  i was instructed to meet up for a interview and exchange information for filing and follow ups if needed.
content.summary: Observed the object, while calling the ellington flight tower to confirm the sighting.

content.detailedDescription: At around 17.30 i was standing on the ridgeway at belvedere road london se2 opposite the horse fields . as i looked over the horse fields i saw coming from my left a black and silver object that looked like a large sea horse in black with a silver dome on top . it crossed over the crossness sewage treatment works slowly and floated over towards the horse fields in a se direction . it came down in the field with horses running from the object but gave me some scale to it . it was around 8ft tall 3 feet wide and stood up right and never made a sound nor did it make any turns . it landed in the reeds so myself and friend went to look . we checked all over fields and treeline but found nothing . it still plays on my mind and am keen to find out what it was .
content.summary: Looked like a large sea horse in shape with a dome on top .

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south and saw a flash then saw a group of lights coming in  i pulled over into the south medford walmart.Oddly i parked next someone else who was witnessing it. i used my phone to video tape the lights would shoot up in the sky. then this thing just did weird stuff pulsating . in the videos you will see a cloud on the left side and a ship pass through it . there is a lotta colered light s and threust what's even weirder is i did see the thrusts the lights while looking up i only caught after iplayed the tape.Back . i have been really messed up since i started having blackouts . i don't want.To sound crazy but everyone thinks i've lost my marbles please tell me what this is.
i submitted by email 2 short videos i don't know how to attach
content.summary: On way home saw a flash then something weird only a caught on phone submitted two videos i too k

content.detailedDescription: Bright starlike object observed in the sky. appeared to be moving, took phone video clip of object transversing the sky. object flys in front of moon. i was out having a cigarette with a friend in watertown, sd. i first thought it was a star, but then i noticed it was obviously moving. had no flashing lights, was solid,  starlike. looked to be traveling faster than any plane i've seen at night.  a plane was observed shortly after with green and red flash ing lights and still visible con trail. object disapeared into night sky.
content.summary: Bright starlike object observed in the sky. appeared to be moving, took phone video clip of object transversing the sky across  the moon. object appears to fade or disapear entiterly.

content.detailedDescription:
Anomaly measured on lubbock, texas weather radar (klbb) at approx 7k feet.  is stationary through several radar cycles.   the same object does not appear when viewed from the amarillo, texas radar (kama) where the beam intersects the same area at approx 4k feet.  meaning, that the amarillo radar beam passed "under" the object that reflected a signal to the lubbock radar when sensed the object at 7k feet.  i'm a meteorologists and have been using radar remote sensing for 20-years, this object isn't "weather" such as a cloud as it does not move in a lateral direction through several radar cycles. 

attaching:

1.  radar imagery from klbb with measurement from radar to object (showing beam height).

2. radar imagery from kama with measurement from radar to object (showing beam height).

3. loop of radar cycles indicating object is stationary.

4. volumetric 3d scan of object (from klbb radar).
content.summary: Radar reflected object; see description

content.detailedDescription:
Location:  northeastern spalding county, georgia
time frame:  22:42 hours to 22:51 hours

on 13 april, 2016, i was following my regular route to work; highway 155 north in spalding county, georgia bound for mcdonough, georgia.  as i was approaching the county line about to cross into henry county, i noticed a light off to the northeast, roughly over frog road and the community of luella.  i was travelling at approximately 55-60 mph, the sky was overcast, with prevailing winds coming out of the northeast, air temperature 57o.  a slight and intermittent rain was present in patchy areas but barely detectable.  the cloud deck was high but solid.  at first glance, i presumed the object was a helicopter, perhaps a med-flight bound for spalding regional hospital in griffin, georgia.  as i watched it, however, it became apparent that it was not a helicopter.  my first instinct as a retired emergency communications officer (911/police/fire radio operator and supervisor, critical incident response commander) was that since the object was relative to the high-tension power lines that cross the highway, i was seeing a power line on fire.  i passed under the power lines and made a u-turn to double check.  as i approached the power lines (heading south), i looked for signs for signs of fire, but the lines were clear. 
 
as i passed the power lines and crossed back into spalding county, the object crossed the highway from left to right and was then concealed by a tree line to my right approximately 600 yards from my position.  i cleared the tree line, and the object was no longer visible.  i decided to pull into a dirt road (johnson road extension) to turn around and abandon any further attempt to view the object.  as i pulled onto 155 and headed north, i spotted the object again almost in the exact same position i was in when i first sighted it, except it was then off to the northwest (left), and relatively stationary.  i stopped the truck and watched it as it appeared to descend roughly over the cole reservoir.  there is a large golf community (heron bay) located where the object appeared to descend.  i had no other witnesses, and, unusually, there were no other vehicles travelling on 155 in either direction when this occurred.  

i cannot quite find a technical description to articulate the object i saw.  i was unable to determine a shape at all.  the light was variable in magnitude; at its brightest, it was about as intense as a street light and amber/orange in color (when the illumination intensified, the spectral range was nearly in the white, but generally dark to amber/orange).  its movement was generally horizontal, with some vertical movement; much like a plastic bag that has been caught by the wind.  the consistency of the color and magnitude of its luminescence was similar to the manner in which an ember emanates light as it rises from a fire.  its speed was also variable, and i would estimate it moving at its fastest during the sighting as no more than 100 mph, and as slow as stationary.  

i have never seen anything like this.  we live in an area that has historically been free from light pollution, use a telescope for stargazing regularly, and see satellites and high altitude aircraft regularly.  i took one or two flight lessons while in high school, and grew up near hartsfield-jackson international airport, so i am no stranger to aircraft and flight patterns (at the time of the sighting, hartsfield had outbound traffic at approximately 10,000 feet, northeast to southwest, roughly 2 minutes between aircraft).  this object gave the impression that it was closer than it appeared.  the illumination was not configured; it was apparently “random” lighting, as though it moved all about the surface of the object, but concentrated primarily at a ventral, abaxial angle from my point of view.  

the best rough coordinates i can provide are as follows:
first sighting:  33o 20’01.81” n x 84o09’58.2” w (moving)
second sighting: 33o 19’14.65” n x 84o 10’56.66” w (moving)
third sighting:  33o 19’59.51” n x 84o 11’52.30” w (stationary/descending)

(note: the first and third coordinate readings are roughly parallel, minus about a thousand horizontal compass feet, i think.)

as a retired emergency communications officer, my professional reputation does not compel me to report such things, but my instincts tell me i saw something odd.  i am not familiar with drones, but would not rule out the possibility of someone with an illuminated drone playing around.  i researched footage for any relevant similarities and they were somewhat, but not entirely consistent with what i saw.  i was unable to take a picture as my cellphone will not zoom and the picture would therefore not have been of any use.  i just thought that since this was the first time i’d ever seen any such thing i might report it to somebody on the outside chance any similar sightings in the area or time frame were reported, or may be reported.
content.summary: Amber/orange, variable magnitude, generally horizontal movement with some vertical variance, speed no more than 100 mph at max, stationary at minimum

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed something coming from the east at a very high speed. this thing was huge.  was star gazing 1/4 mile outside and se of oatman az at approx 2500? feet right after dark.  if interested i can scan you a drawing.  it was less than 800 feet from me and hovering for short time. it quickly vanished after i seen a car coming up the hill.  thought it was maybe car lights coming up hill causing apparition but this thing had way way too much definition to it. another  car came up the hill 15 minutes later but no repeat of this apparition so don't think it was car lights. 
it was seen against a clear sky.  very strange indeed.  i could not believe what i was seeing. had a camera around my neck but was too stunned to get a pic.. at first i thought it was a fighter jet but then thought maybe a helicopter.  it acted somewhat like a helicopter hovering but no sound and no blades and too big with two weird very bright green lites on the side.

you can email me but do not call me on this - thanks

jerry
content.summary: Object was white & in shape of ww!! submarine without the conning tower. two long brighht rectangular green lights on side. about size of a submatine no wings or blades. made no noisegreen lihts rctanhlur

content.detailedDescription: Rachel, jeanne, and me (tommi) (you may use our first names) were visiting the echo amphitheater in abiquiu, nm.In the later afternoon on april 9, 2016.   we were all taking photographs.  rachel noticed a round, glowing blue light in one of her photos.  at first we thought it was a reflection from the camera.  it was curious so we examined all of the photos we took at the amphitheater and saw the same or a similar glowing "blue orb" in four more of our pictures.  we enlarged the images and found that the glowing blue orbs appear to have smaller white spheres clinging to them.  we do not know if all of the photos are of one orb, or if we photographed more than one.  we did not actually see the blue orbs, only captured it/them in our photographs.  in some photos the orb appears solid while in others it appears partially or totally transparent.   we are attaching the photographs along with each orb enlarged for better viewing.  here are the pictures.  we would love to know what mufon thinks.
content.summary: Glowing blue orbs with attached white spheres captured in our photographs.

content.detailedDescription: I am only submitting this this because i want an opinion on what i have found. i was on google earth looking around some of the lakes i fish nearby my home town. i zoomed in on a lake close by to one of the lakes i fish very often and this right green object caught my eye. there is a plane flying by on the right. i don't know too much about google earths footage, maybe it's just a glitch. who knows. i'm into ufos and all that so i figured i send this screen shot off google earth to you guys. i'm sure you guys get stuff like this all the time. maybe you have already seen this object. let me know what you guys think or if you have any questions. thanks.
content.summary: I have no idea what this object could be.

content.detailedDescription: Around 1993 i'm guessing .I was around 11 yrs old .Late night church service had ended and i was the first one to go outside and the rest stayed inside to mingle .I was walking to the car and stopped .I turned around and looked back toward the church and on the left side of it in the cotton field hovered a sphere the size of a basketball .Just above the cotton 20 ft away or so.I stood in amazement and in silence .Until it decided to take off in a straight line and change direction in an instant and disappeared.My aunt and cousin that took me there that night told me it was an angel.I haven't a clue .Years later when i was around 20 my brother gave me a call and told me he was driving at about twilight in arcadia la,that he had a sphere in a field moving parralell but at a distance.
content.summary: Glowing sphere hovering 20-30 ft away

content.detailedDescription: It was evening when i saw the light the first time, i was in my kitchen when i noticed a small light that was floating towards the sky. i first thought it was one of the radio towers from the hill, but i noticed that it was floating. it floated up then began to dim until it was no longer there. i had no strange thoughts or feelings. i know it was not an airplane because the airport is on the other side of the city and does not fly towards my direction. i still do not know what it is or if anyone else have seen it in my city either. it came multiple nights and then stopped appearing compleatly.
content.summary: A small light floating up to the sky and slowly dimming until it was completely dark

content.detailedDescription: I'm a canadian truck driver. stopped at the sandstone rest area in michigan. got out of my truck and looked up to see if the sky was clear. i noticed what i thought to be jupiter and beside it was a bright star. that star began to move so i thought it was an airplane. the object only moved a few degrees to the north slowed then there was a bright flash and was transformed into a much smaller greenish object that moved very fast upwards getting smaller and smaller till it disappeared. there were no other objects  visible. when i came out of the eest area building i looked back up into the sky to see if anything else was going on the only thing were stars and what i'm assuming was jupiter. then i bunked down for the night.
content.summary: Thought it was a bright star began to move thought it was a plane but didn't appear to be.

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of april 13th 2016 at 10:12 am i went out too my back yard to let my dog out for the morning here in warwick.R.I. i was outside for just a few mins as i looked up at jet leaving 4 vapor trails maybe a 747 at about 30 thousand ft straight over my head on a clear sunny morning . i live on the east coast and i see most of the international flights coming from europe fly over us here in new england so i am always looking up when i go outside. i looked down at my dog for just a few seconds then i went to check out the plane again and as i look back up i see something just over the treeline in my backyard at about 500 feet.(the trees are aprox 20 ft from where i am standing at this moment and they are about 50 ft tall with no leaves on them yet) then this red orange almost straightened boomerang looking object was hovering with a slight wobble  not making a sound. at first i thought it was a hawk riding the wind with his wings out but this was to wide to be a hawk and the i noticed a small bright spot on the middle on the outside  edge of this thing like if the morning sun reflecting off it. so at this point  i knew it wasn't a hawk so i watched this object for about 3 min trying to see if it was a mylar balloon or something like that but i could see it was too big to be that . besides it was hovering like riding the wind and not going up and still not making a sound ,so then i ran inside my house to grab my camera that took about 2 min and when i went back outside it was gone. and the feeling i had was anger because i couldn't get it on film and then i stayed outside for an hr to see if i see it again but i didn't.
content.summary: A red and orange almost a boomerang shape buy a little more straightened out it also had a small bright spot on one edge toward the middle on the object as it hovered silently.

content.detailedDescription: This camera doesn't do this object any justice.  it was a large, red perfect sphere that made zero noise.  it was glowing like it had a force field around it.  i couldn't see any interior or exterior lights.  no discernible outlines or shapes. it started just east of my house around 500 feet up heading se.  i don't know how far se it went, maybe 5-10 miles before it started to descend beneath the tree line.  after it went down beneath the trees another one appeared right where the red one had first started.  this one was green but i was only able to get a picture of it while it was moving.  this one went a lot faster and i had no time to get a video. i hope you can bring this to someone so that they can clean it up for you. it was amazing and the third time in my life i have encountered ufo's.  later that same evening there was also a very large, slow, low flying plane that flew over our town.  it seemed like a cargo plane to me.  my oldest son and my wife were also there to witness the sightings.
content.summary: There were 2 ufo's.  one red, one green.  perfect sphere's, no outer lights on either one.  no sound.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:35 p.M., wednesday, april 12, 2016. it was a really clear night, and i just happened to look out my dining room window. i noticed two flashing lights in the lower west. they were brighter than airplanes. i kept looking at them, and one would flash/blink off & on (blink blink blink), then the other one (on the right) would do the same thing back (blink blink blink)! they did this a few times, then all of a sudden the one on the left changed its shape, like a long light beam that stretched out! it changed back to the star shape, but then it stretched out again . it reminded me of lightning going horizontally! weird! the light on the right stayed the same, but blinked! then, i saw a smaller light fly by quickly heading to the southeast. it looked like the light flew between them? it all happened under 3 minutes. the two larger lights got smaller then headed west and disappeared quickly.
content.summary: Looking out to the west, i saw the 2 bright lights, blinking back & forth (mimicking each other). one light stretched out like lightning, then returned to the original shape a few times.

content.detailedDescription:
Not more than a minute after new years 2016, went outside to observe the neighborhood fireworks and celebrate, noticed 2 orange/reddish orbs off at a distance n-ne at about 3-7miles out~ leveled with the treeline/powerline/roof of houses level. the orbs were going in a west in a horizontal way a plane would. observed for about 20-30 seconds before they went past the roofline of houses about 300ft away. tried asking other family members if they saw what i saw, but no one responded.
~no change in color, or no blinking
~followed each other in a set position
content.summary: 2orange\reddish orbs off at a distance

content.detailedDescription: I woke at 7:40 am. i was lying on my back in a bed under a large window through which i could see the northern sky upside down. the object looked like a small ball of fire with a bright yellow, glowing center and a duller perimeter, which also glowed. the "center" was 3/4 of the object; the perimeter was the outer 1/4 of the object. my first thought was that it was being lit by the sun and what i was witnessing was reflected light. but my next thought was that the object had it own light. i do not think i saw reflected light. the object moved from the northwwest to the northeast in four seconds and then went out of range of my sight. i don't know why but i started counting as soon as i saw it. it felt like a natural thing to do at the time, but now that i say it it sounds odd. the object moved very quickly, far faster than an airplane. ten minutes later, i went outside to gather my morning paper from the lawn, and i looked into the northern sky where i had seen the object. i saw three "jets," those ubiquitous "pointy" objects with what is known as chem trails or exhausts, all very far away and appearing to travel slowly. they were traveling in three different directions, one from west to southwest, one from north to northeast, and one on what seemed to be a path due north.
content.summary: Object moved from east to west quickly.

content.detailedDescription: So my friend and i were out flying his drone. well as soon as we flew the drone up into the air i saw these two lights, about 500 feet up directly above us just shoot off heading ne. the lights appeared to be a fixed distance apart of about 100 ft. the oddest thing besides their incredible speed and silence was that they were semi transparent, as if they were from a cloaked ship.
content.summary: 2 lights fixed 100 feet apart hoverimg above school then moving at extreme speed

content.detailedDescription: So my friend and i were out flying his drone. well as soon as we flew the drone up into the air i saw these two lights, about 500 feet up directly above us just shoot off heading ne. the lights appeared to be a fixed distance apart of about 100 ft. the oddest thing besides their incredible speed and silence was that they were semi transparent, as if they were from a cloaked ship.
content.summary: 2 lights fixed 100 feet apart hoverimg above school then moving at extreme speed

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw the object moving at a steady speed from the south, and took it to be a satellite due to its brightness and height. however, it appeared to be moving slightly slower than the satellites i have watched and it was on an arc from ssw to nw, where it became obscured by trees. the arc became a little more acute towards the end of the sighting. the light was consistent - no flicker, tumbling or flashing. 

the sky was absolutely clear - no clouds, with stars clearly visible. i regularly see passenger aircraft, and am very familiar with their paths and lighting characteristics; this object was much, much higher, on a different path with none of the flashing lights associated with traditional aircraft. in addition, i live in the country where it's silent at this time of day - i would have heard the engines of any aircraft passing by, as i do whenever one is in the area.

if i had taken the time to go inside for my camera i  seriously doubt i would have been able to do so in time to catch anything.

thank you
content.summary: Object was at first thought to be a satellite

content.detailedDescription:
Ok quick story - have mostly kept it to myself for 50 years - but just watched the mufon history channel ufo shows from 2014-15.Just wanting to see if anything like this was seen in oakland or other places?
i was a kid of 6-7 years old at the time - grandpa had a 20 acre farm in oakland somewhere since 1955 ish when he retired - so i was like 6 years old in 1964. my mum and dad and myself had gone over to visit grandma and grandpa for the day from san fran. - we got over to their place and grandpa wanted to go to the store and do some grocery shopping - anyway - mum and dad went with him to the store and i staid at the house with grandma. so i was in the house for a bit with grandma then went out the back door to the back yard area to play or explore or whatever and ran around the side of the house and i saw this white polar bear standing there near a tree - bushy pine trees were around the back yard - not too tall trees - maybe 20-30 ft high - but big backyard area bordering the farm area. anyway - this white polar bear was standing there on it's back hind legs just looking at me or watching me and or the area. i stopped dead in my tracks and just stood there looking at it myself for maybe 1-2-3 minutes - not sure how long but not more than a couple of minutes or even one minute watching it. the "bear" was a good 8-9-10 ft high standing up  - but i was a small kid but it wasn't making any noises or anything - i think i remember it having one arm and paw up in the air straight - then maybe brought it down - but it was just standing there near a bushy pine tree on the back side of the house - i was maybe 20-30 ft away from it. it just stood there and was either looking at me or away but facing me slightly angled from me - not standing straight on. it was n't coming at me or anything - just standing there and i remember very still - not moving at all really.
so i didn't feel held in place or anything - and do not think i was getting any mind telepathy either -  just that i stared at it for a minute or two - then i ran back inside to tell my grandma that there was a white bear in the back yard area and to come out and have a look. well grandma said maybe i saw a fox or something... i said no way it was a fox - it was this big white bear... so after a minute or two of talking to her she agreed to come outside and have a look - i think she grabbed a stick or broom or something and we go outside to check - and of course the bear was gone... anyway - she looked around a bit and brought me back inside and told me not to imagine things or tell fibs about things i see... so anyway that was my white polar bear experience at 6-7 years old in oakland ca. supposedly the farm is now condominiums - but was not way out in the countryside...At the time it would have been not too far out - maybe a suburb area now. 
just wanted to put the story on file with mufon for the record...Pretty sure no polar bear had escaped from the zoo but who knows... it sure was not a fox i saw like grandma thought.

anyway - keep up the good work - thought i had to impart the story - am 57 years old and have told the story a couple of times... if it was not an escaped bear from the zoo then it was something else - looked like a full grown big white polar bear standing on it's hind legs and not making any noises or anything. i just googled it and do not see anything about a polar bear escaping. definetely had an effect on me at 6 years old and to this day i still wonder what it was if not a real white bear escaped from the zoo - which i still do not think it was.

anyway - just a kid and put in the back of the mind but it is still there and i thought i should tell mufon about it anyway.

thanks for all the ufo info and really liked the history channel shows! am american but living and working in thailand now for many years.
content.summary: Saw a white polar bear on it's hind legs - not moving

content.detailedDescription: Now i am sure that i was clicking the shot of the jet in the sky but i captured something on the bottom that was going clockwise and it could be something really simple to explain but my point is nothing unusual
content.summary: Bright light before it's gone it kind a turn into fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Around july 13 2013 i was awake getting a glass of water around 2 am. 

i looked out my window at the time in my old apartment. the windwo faces the miramichi river. i was looking to wards nelson to the s and west of me. 

i saw a orb like glowing object doing strange things and i felt as i was in a daze and time seemed to slow down. i opened the window but no noise can be heard.

this occurred for about 15 minutes and the object moved in a southern direction.
content.summary: Ball of light that hovered and moved around and drop down and make turns fast

content.detailedDescription: Saw triangle of three lights while i was facing south.  it was heading in a north west direction.  i only saw the object for about three seconds before the lights dimmed.  i did not witness any body to the aircraft, it blended in with the night sky.  the object appeared to be about as large as a full moon.  the lights were dim, and were yellowish orange like mercury lights.  i was listening to music at the time, and when i saw the object i immediately stopped.  i have seen odd things in the skies in the past, but nothing that i would definitively classify as a ufo.  this was absolutely a ufo, and it is rather unnerving.
content.summary: Triangle of three lights

content.detailedDescription:
While standing in front of the deli in brooklyn an object came from the east it crossed the kings highway it was broad daylight . i watched as it flew with a black aura . the object came into view it was completely round black ball that flew close enough to give off the aura so that as it passed i could feel it's emulation as if it passed not only in the air but through me.The feeling and day is still as vivid as if it were yesterday.The object was
about as big as the newyears ball . it kept a straight path toward south shore highschool . this was no balloon. hav phone and will take pics.
content.summary: 14!/15 standing outside of a deli on remsen and church ave. a black orb in a straightline path floats by in broad daylight. it had a silky black aura. the aura looked to be a wavy aura  only expanded elbows length from it. no wings or drone features .

content.detailedDescription: I was walking towards my car in my residential driveway when i felt a vibration. i look up across the street above my neighbor's house and saw a bright white light. it did not appear to be a drone, airplane, or helicopter. i watched the ufo hover for about three minutes before an airplane appeared. the ufo appeared to be round and had white solid lights, it then began to flash red and green lights randomly and slowly.  the ufo began to wobble  then launched very quickly and went towards route 202 in yorktown heights. once it launched i decided to follow it in my car. i found the clearest view of the ufo over elizabeth street. this is when i spotted three lined up horizontally and the bright one that i had followed there was to the left of the three. a fifth ufo was further out in the distance. in total i spotted five ufos. from the first few minutes of seeing the ufo i knew it was something out of the ordinary and abnormal. after ten minutes of watching the ufos i decided to head back home.
content.summary: Ufo hovered. wobbled once plane was in sight. ufo launched to area with 4 other ufos.

content.detailedDescription: my son and i were sitting in the hobby lobby parking lot waiting for my other son to come out when we noticed a bright golden/yellow spherical object high up in the northwest sky. it was very bright and appeared out of nowhere.  it changed direction back-and-forth from right to left and back back again over a great distance very fast. it wound up in the southwest part of the sky and then began its descent  at a fast speed. it also swayed back-and-forth as it was descending.  we lost sight of it after it descended behind the building from our viewpoint however i feel that the object was a great distance away.   because of its distance we did not feel threatened but we were astonished that we witnessed what we did.  we did not know what the object was when it appeared nor do we know what it was after we lost sight of it.  the video is only about 20 seconds long however approximately 20 seconds transpired before we are able to get out the iphone and video record it.
content.summary: The object appeared out of nowhere swayed back-and-forth  and descended rapidly
